speaker: Sarah
text: Hey Leo, did you get my note about the crashing issue?
ipa: heɪ ˈliːoʊ, dɪd ju ɡɛt maɪ noʊt əˈbaʊt ðə ˈkræʃɪŋ ˈɪʃuː?
stress: HEY Leo, did you GET my NOTE about the CRASHING ISSUE?
linking:
"did you" → /dɪd ju/ (d + y linking)
"note about" → /noʊt əˈbaʊt/ (t + a linking)

speaker: Leo
text: Yeah, I did. I’ve been working on reproducing it since this morning. Turns out it only happens when the user logs in with a social account.
ipa: jæ, aɪ dɪd. aɪv bɪn ˈwɜːrkɪŋ ɒn ˌriːprəˈduːsɪŋ ɪt sɪns ðɪs ˈmɔːrnɪŋ. tɜrnz aʊt ɪt ˈoʊnli ˈhæpənz wɛn ðə ˈjuːzər lɔɡz ɪn wɪð ə ˈsoʊʃəl əˈkaʊnt.
stress: YEAH, I DID. I’ve been WORKING on REPRODUCING it since this MORNING. TURNS out it ONLY HAPPENS when the USER LOGS IN with a SOCIAL ACCOUNT.
linking:
"been working" → /bɪn ˈwɜːrkɪŋ/ (n + w linking)
"logs in" → /lɔɡz ɪn/ (z + i linking)

speaker: Sarah
text: Ugh, classic. I’m kind of annoyed with how unstable the auth library is lately.
ipa: ʌɡ, ˈklæsɪk. aɪm kaɪnd əv əˈnɔɪd wɪð haʊ ʌnˈsteɪbəl ði ɔːθ ˈlaɪbrəri ɪz ˈleɪtli.
stress: UGH, CLASSIC. I’m KIND of ANNOYED with how UNSTABLE the AUTH LIBRARY is LATELY.
linking:
"kind of" → /kaɪnd əv/ (d + o linking)
"auth library" → /ɔːθ ˈlaɪbrəri/ (th + l linking)

speaker: Leo
text: Same here. I even wrote to their support team about it, but no reply yet. I apologize for not keeping you updated earlier — was knee-deep in logs.
ipa: seɪm hɪr. aɪ ˈiːvən roʊt tu ðɛr səˈpɔːrt tiːm əˈbaʊt ɪt, bət noʊ rɪˈplaɪ jɛt. aɪ əˈpɑːlədʒaɪz fər nɒt ˈkiːpɪŋ ju ˈʌpdeɪtɪd ˈɜːrliər — wəz ˈniː diːp ɪn lɔɡz.
stress: SAME HERE. I even WROTE to their SUPPORT TEAM about it, but NO REPLY yet. I APOLOGIZE for NOT KEEPING you UPDATED EARLIER — was KNEE-DEEP in LOGS.
linking:
"wrote to" → /roʊt tu/ (t + t linking)
"keeping you" → /ˈkiːpɪŋ ju/ (g + y linking)

speaker: Sarah
text: No worries! I rely on you for these tricky bugs — you always spot something I miss.
ipa: noʊ ˈwɜːriz! aɪ rɪˈlaɪ ɒn ju fər ðiːz ˈtrɪki bʌɡz — ju ˈɔːlweɪz spɒt ˈsʌmθɪŋ aɪ mɪs.
stress: NO WORRIES! I RELY on YOU for these TRICKY BUGS — you ALWAYS SPOT SOMETHING I MISS.
linking:
"rely on" → /rɪˈlaɪ ɒn/ (y + o linking)
"spot something" → /spɒt ˈsʌmθɪŋ/ (t + s linking)

speaker: Leo
text: Haha, well… I’m anxious about pushing a hotfix without QA’s green light. They still haven’t responded to my ticket.
ipa: hɑː hɑː, wɛl… aɪm ˈæŋkʃəs əˈbaʊt ˈpʊʃɪŋ ə ˈhɒtfɪks wɪˈðaʊt ˌkjuːˈeɪz ɡriːn laɪt. ðeɪ stɪl ˈhævənt rɪˈspɒndɪd tu maɪ ˈtɪkɪt.
stress: HAHA, WELL… I’m ANXIOUS about PUSHING a HOTFIX without QA’s GREEN LIGHT. They STILL HAVEN’T RESPONDED to my TICKET.
linking:
"pushing a" → /ˈpʊʃɪŋ ə/ (g + a linking)
"green light" → /ɡriːn laɪt/ (n + l linking)

speaker: Sarah
text: Want me to talk to someone from their team? I’m friendly with Matt from QA — maybe he can help.
ipa: wɒnt mi tu tɔːk tu ˈsʌmwʌn frəm ðɛr tiːm? aɪm ˈfrɛndli wɪð mæt frəm ˌkjuːˈeɪ — ˈmeɪbi hi kən hɛlp.
stress: WANT me to TALK to SOMEONE from their TEAM? I’m FRIENDLY with MATT from QA — maybe HE can HELP.
linking:
"talk to" → /tɔːk tu/ (k + t linking)
"he can" → /hi kən/ (e + c linking)

speaker: Leo
text: That would be awesome, thanks! Also, while you’re at it, can you ask about the flaky tests in the staging suite?
ipa: ðæt wʊd bi ˈɔːsəm, θæŋks! ˈɔːlsoʊ, waɪl jʊr æt ɪt, kæn ju æsk əˈbaʊt ðə ˈfleɪki tɛsts ɪn ðə ˈsteɪdʒɪŋ swiːt?
stress: THAT would be AWESOME, THANKS! ALSO, WHILE you’re AT it, can you ASK about the FLAKY TESTS in the STAGING SUITE?
linking:
"would be" → /wʊd bi/ (d + b linking)
"ask about" → /æsk əˈbaʊt/ (k + a linking)

speaker: Sarah
text: On it. And hey, thanks again — this issue’s been eating at me all week.
ipa: ɒn ɪt. ənd heɪ, θæŋks əˈɡɛn — ðɪs ˈɪʃuːz bɪn ˈiːtɪŋ æt mi ɔːl wiːk.
stress: ON it. And HEY, THANKS again — this ISSUE’s been EATING at me ALL WEEK.
linking:
"thanks again" → /θæŋks əˈɡɛn/ (s + a linking)
"eating at" → /ˈiːtɪŋ æt/ (g + a linking)
